content: May I ping #14981? It generalize the construction of a power_basis in docs#adjoin.power_basis to GCD domain. (Note that even if adjoin.power_basis' immediately implies adjoin.power_basis, we use the former to prove the latter.). I think it is a very useful generalization, my only doubt is about the name, we can add a ' as in docs#adjoin_root.power_basis' (this is the current form in the PR) or add gcd or something similar. Thanks!
